getItems.name: getItems
getItems.description: Returns an array of the {@link global#InputHelperItem InputHelperItem} objects that contain all the items from the input helper.

setItems.name: setItems
setItems.description: Sets the items to the input helper.

params.name: items
params.description: Defines an array of the {@link global#InputHelperItem InputHelperItem} objects which contain all the items for the input helper.

params.name: width
params.description: The input helper window width measured in millimeters.

params.name: height
params.description: The input helper window height measured in millimeters.

params.name: isCaptureKeyboard
params.description: Defines if the keyboard is caught (true) or not (false).

getScrollSizes.name: getScrollSizes
getScrollSizes.description: Returns the sizes of the input helper scrolled window. Returns an object with width and height parameters.

comment:
/**
	 * Class representing an input helper - a window that appears and disappears when you type text. Its location is tied to the cursor.
	 * @global
	 * @class
	 * @name InputHelper
	 * @hideconstructor
	 */
description: Class representing an input helper - a window that appears and disappears when you type text. Its location is tied to the cursor.
